sections.heading: Bigamy; when; penalty.If any Indian who is married according to the provisions of sections 42-402 to 42-404 shall, while his or her husband or wife is living, be married to another person, either in legal form or according to Indian custom, he or she shall be guilty of bigamy and shall be punished t
sections.text: Bigamy; when; penalty.If any Indian who is married according to the provisions of sections 42-402 to 42-404 shall, while his or her husband or wife is living, be married to another person, either in legal form or according to Indian custom, he or she shall be guilty of bigamy and shall be punished therefor as provided by law.SourceLaws 1913, c. 68, § 6, p. 202;R.S.1913, § 1612;C.S.1922, § 1561;C.S.1929, § 42-406;R.S.1943, § 42-406;Laws 1999, LB 8, § 1.Cross ReferencesBigamy, penalty, see section 28-701.
